scripts.build:wasm: make -C crates all && make -C crates install
scripts.build: yarn clean && yarn build:wasm && yarn build:sol:types && yarn build:tsc
scripts.build:sol:types: echo "Generating smart contract typings" && TS_NODE_PROJECT=./tsconfig.hardhat.json hardhat typechain
scripts.faucet: NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-wasm-modules TS_NODE_PROJECT=./tsconfig.hardhat.json HOPR_ENVIRONMENT_ID=hardhat-localhost hardhat faucet --use-local-identities --identity-prefix local --password local
scripts.test: yarn test:wasm && NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-wasm-modules TS_NODE_PROJECT=./tsconfig.hardhat.json HOPR_ENVIRONMENT_ID=hardhat-localhost HOPR_HARDHAT_TAG=testing hardhat test:in-group
scripts.coverage: NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-wasm-modules TS_NODE_PROJECT=./tsconfig.hardhat.json HOPR_ENVIRONMENT_ID=hardhat-localhost HOPR_HARDHAT_TAG=testing hardhat coverage
scripts.deploy:local: NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-wasm-modules TS_NODE_PROJECT=./tsconfig.hardhat.json HOPR_ENVIRONMENT_ID=hardhat-localhost hardhat deploy --network hardhat --write true
scripts.deploy:goerli: NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-wasm-modules TS_NODE_PROJECT=./tsconfig.hardhat.json HOPR_ENVIRONMENT_ID=master-goerli hardhat deploy --network goerli --write true
